values: 导游，向导；指南；入门；手册；路标
A guide is someone who shows you where to go.
We followed a guide at the park.

n .领路人， 向导，指南；vt .指导， 支配， 带领
To guide is to lead or direct someone to a particular destination or course of action.
A guide is a person or thing that provides direction or advice to help others achieve a particular goal or outcome.
